faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Monster Synth

q1.question: How does Monster Synth work?
q1.answer: Monster Synth analyzes your music in real-time using advanced machine learning algorithms. Each audio track is broken down into frequencies, rhythms and dynamics that directly influence the genetics and evolution of your digital monster.

q2.question: What audio formats are supported?
q2.answer: I currently support MP3, WAV, FLAC and AAC. You can also record directly from the microphone or use real-time audio input from your device to create monsters that react instantly to music.

q3.question: Are all monsters unique?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Every monster generated by Monster Synth is completely unique. The AI algorithms create distinctive genetic combinations based on your specific audio input, ensuring that no two monsters are ever exactly alike, even from the same song.

q4.question: Is it free?
q4.answer: Monster Synth offers a free plan that includes basic monster creation and 5 save slots. Premium plans unlock advanced features like high-quality export, unlimited monsters and early access to new features.

q5.question: Can I use Monster Synth for commercial projects?
q5.answer: Yes! Premium subscribers can use their generated monsters for commercial purposes, including music videos, live performances, and digital art projects. The free plan is limited to personal use only.
